roleset.name: insert a tube in, having a tube inserted
roleset.note: INTUBATE-V NOTES: Based on sentences in medical data. No VN or FN classes. Comparison to intubation-n. Framed by Katie. (from intubate.01-v)
INTUBATED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from intubated.01-j)

example.name: With cause
example.text: Due to respiratory acidosis along with poor mentation, *PRO*-1 was intubated *-1
example.arg: Due to respiratory acidosis with poor mentation,

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Dr. Goodman stated that he recalled, prior to his intubation of Ms.Gordon, asking for 100mg of suxamethonium.
